name: Saltwind Village
description: A picturesque fishing village perched on coastal cliffs overlooking the sea. Boats bob in the protected harbor while nets dry in the salty breeze. The villagers make their living from the bounty of the ocean.

center.name: Harbor Square
center.description: The village center overlooks the busy fishing harbor. Weathered fishermen mend nets while seabirds call overhead. The square smells of salt air and fresh catch.

buildings.name: The Anchor's Rest
buildings.description: A cozy inn serving fresh seafood and providing rooms for traveling merchants and sailors.

buildings.name: Nets & Hooks
buildings.description: A shop selling fishing gear and maritime supplies.

buildings.name: Shrine to the Sea Mother
buildings.description: A shrine dedicated to the goddess of the sea, where fishermen pray for safe voyages.

north.name: Cliff Road
north.description: The northern edge of the village where the coast road winds up into the hills. Merchant wagons arrive here carrying goods from inland cities.

buildings.name: Coastal Trading Post
buildings.description: A warehouse where inland goods are traded for sea products.
